name: Fix Inconsistent State
prompt: This notebook has been executed out of order, resulting in inconsistent state. The execution counts show a non-sequential order. Re-order or re-execute the cells so that the notebook runs top-to-bottom without errors and all outputs are consistent with the code.

setup.description: Notebook with cells executed in wrong order (0->3->1->5->2->4). Variables may reference data not yet defined at the time of execution.
